text.p: Click on a column header to sort the table.

ROW.title: Maximum Page Size
ROW.tagdesc: The size of the largest page in the document (including any in contained documents).

ROW.title: Number of Pages
ROW.tagdesc: The number of pages in the document (including any in contained documents).

ROW.title: Fonts
ROW.tagdesc: An unordered array of fonts that are used in the document (including any in contained documents).

ROW.title: Colorants
ROW.tagdesc: An ordered array of colorants (swatches) that are used in the document (including any in contained documents).

ROW.title: Plate Names
ROW.tagdesc: An ordered array of plate names that are needed to print the document (including any in contained documents).
